name: BANNA THE CROWN
description:
The Story;
The legend tells that the BANNA's  people were endowed with great knowledge and wisdom. Unfortunately a bad epidemic decimated almost the entire population. The remaining men decided to create a sanctuary or keep all their knowledge and divine crown.
This same legend says that he who will be able to cross all the tests being in this sanctuary to seize the crown and thus to become the most intelligent of the world.
 Maybe it will be you ..
